doc: Make sure you are running the latest version of Home Assistant before reporting an issue.

You should only file an issue if you found a bug. Feature and enhancement requests should go in [the Feature Requests section](https://community.home-assistant.io/c/feature-requests) of our community forum:
On startup a stacktrace is presented when the component tries to restore the old state for `away_mode`
No stacktrace should be presented, and the value restoration should be ignored if old_state doesn't contain `away_mode` key
2018-02-01 20:58:34 ERROR (MainThread) [homeassistant.core] Error doing job: Task exception was never retrieved
Already lined up a PR for this #12121
